lyrics:
9 contributorson your wings lyricschorus
god there is gold hidden deep in the the ground
god theres a hangman that wants to come round

verse 1
how we rise when were born
like the ravens in the corn
on their wings on our knees
crawling careless from the sea

chorus
god give us love in the time that we have
god give us love in the time that we have

chorus
god there are guns growing out of our bones
god every road takes us farther from home

verse 2
all these men that you made
how we wither in the shade
of your trees on your wings
we are carried to the sea

chorus
god give us love in the time that we have
god give us love in the time that we havesee iron  wine liveget tickets as low as 60you might also likeembed
